title: BoringStocks
description: Boring Stocks is a minimalistic stock information website for the average trader. I worked collaboratively with a team of coders and always communicated clearly to maintain an efficient workspace. Specifically, I programmed the back-end, connecting the web application to our API.

title: Popcorn
description: Popcorn, a movie-sharing web application that connects film lovers and tv show enthusiasts alike in an interactive online community. This project challenged me to conquer new programming skills where I became proficient in utilizing databases to create seamless authentication and authorization.
